ECG waveform reference is as follows
Represents a point change in the ventricular myocardium.
Represents the potential change of the atrial muscle depolarization. Most of the forms are generally round in shape and sometimes have a slight incision.
It is a line segment from the end point of the QRS complex to the start of the T wave, representing the slow repolarization process of the ventricle.
Representing the rapid repolarization of the ventricle is the potential change.

When "medication reminder" is enabled, it will be set to vibrate during the set time. Regular medications improve compliance and thus enhance treatment outcomes.
When “Drinking Water Reminder” is enabled, the device will be alerted by vibration during the set time. It is recommended that adults drink 1500ml-1700ml a day.

Why should I enter the reference value of BP to measure BP after calibration:
About the device directly measuring BP data display problems:

Click on the mobile phone APP to measure with a finger on the metal electrode of the device surface. To ensure the accuracy of the data, please rest quietly for five minutes before testing. Do not smoke, drink, drink coffee, eat or take drugs within 2 hours of testing. Wait, the test process should be static, stable mood and mentality, keep quiet. If the ECG pattern is disordered or there is no waveform, try to hold the hand or moisten the electrode with the appropriate water to keep the electrode in close contact with the human body.

When the Android mobile phone is connected to the device, when the mobile phone is connected, the mobile device management should be disconnected first; when the Apple mobile phone is connected to the device, when the Android mobile phone is connected, the mobile device management should first restore the factory settings and disconnect. At this time, the Android phone searches for the binding connection.

The BP of the human body is related to the calibration value. The calibration value can be used to more accurately detect the BP of the human body. Each individual\'s physical difference is different, and the individual differences of hypertension and hypotension are obvious. Therefore, the BP patient will be more measured after setting the calibration value. Precision.

1. Wearing method, it needs to be fit to the human skin to maintain the relative moisture of the human body, and the hands and the heart are flush. \n2. Please add water to moisten when keeping more hair, keep quiet.

Electrocardiogram The heart is excited by the pacemaker, the atria, and the ventricle in each cardiac cycle. With the changes in bioelectricity, various forms of potential changes (ECG) are extracted from the body surface by electrocardiograph. . Electrocardiogram is an objective indicator of the occurrence, spread and recovery process of cardiac excitability. The relationship between the waveforms of electrocardiogram and myocardial action potentials. The action point bitmaps of individual cardiomyocytes are significantly different from the electrocardiograms of each cardiac cycle.
The device is designed to be worn by the left hand. If you are wearing it in your right hand, please wear it in your personal settings.
When testing BP directly on the device, the data cannot be synced to the app and can only be viewed on the device side.
Is the device near the phone?
When the APP is connected to the device, first make sure that the device is fully charged and close to the device. The closer the distance is, the better it is to find the device.
Is the device connected to another phone?

If your device is connected by another phone and the connected phone is still nearby, you need to unbind the device and turn off the Bluetooth of the connected phone to ensure that the current device is received, because one device can only be one at the same time. Mobile phone connection.
If the device is fully charged and you can\'t find the device close to your phone, you can try turning the phone off and then turn it back on. Wait a moment and search for the device again.
If the device is not connected by another phone and the device is still not found, you can try rebooting the device and then open the app to search for the device again.
Please try restarting your phone, reopen the app and connect to the device.

The BP level calibration value is an average value obtained by a large-scale sampling of Chinese people by a national authoritative medical institution. To ensure that the measured values ​​are more realistic due to personal differences, please measure the BP after calibration.
The precision value calibration value needs to use the average value of the data measured by the nationally qualified qualified BP device or the BP average value of the physical examination.
1. When measuring, please put the arm of the wearing device on the table, and the index finger of the other hand is naturally placed on the touch button until the test is completed.
2. Note that the wrist should be close to the electrode piece at the bottom of the device. If the skin is dry, it can be moistened with water to make it more conductive.
Poor conductivity, it is recommended to test the water at the sensor contact.

The HRV Health Index analyzes the health parameters of the body according to the results of real-time measurement of the dynamic electrocardiogram by analyzing the parameters such as the variability of the average HR and HR. The health index is increased, which represents the better health of the body. The health index is reduced, which means that the body needs to pay attention to daily healthy life.

The degree of fatigue caused by work, labor and sports. Excessive fatigue can cause stiffness in the shoulder muscles, headache, insomnia, fatigue, waist pain, etc., and easily cause nervous system, endocrine system disorders, causing many chronic diseases and mental fatigue.

The load index of the body that is comprehensively considered by fatigue and mental stress reflects the physical and psychological load on people. The external environment is interfered by factors such as society, life and competition, and is affected by its own physical condition and mental state.

Physical fitness is the ability to adapt and deal with the problems encountered under external fatigue and mental stress. The fitness index reflects the body\'s ability to adapt to environmental changes and stress stimuli to maintain and restore health.

Cardiac function users measure the health of a person\'s heart, and the performance of heart function varies depending on the degree of love of the heart and the overall health status. Develop a healthy life and eating habits: reasonable exercise, forced heart, calcium replacement, protect blood vessels, eat sweets, stabilize BP, can actively prevent heart disease, is a strategy to strengthen heart function.

Your current health status is average. Please refer to the detailed recommendations below. Make work and rest, strengthen exercise, pay attention to diet, and reduce day and night. Can improve the physical fitness.
Your current health is good. Please refer to the detailed recommendations below. A combination of work and rest, moderate exercise, scientific diet and adequate sleep to improve physical fitness.

Your current health status is excellent, please keep it. Please refer to the detailed recommendations below. A combination of work and rest, moderate exercise, scientific diet and adequate sleep to improve physical fitness.
Pay attention to rest, try not to stay up late.
Stay up late and take part in outdoor activities. Maintain a positive, optimistic and happy mood.
Participate in social interactions and avoid emotional excitement. If the physical and mental load is too high for a long time, it is recommended to consult a psychiatrist
Avoid fatigue. Don\'t sit for a long time and walk around.
Maintain good mood, mental pleasure, and positive optimism.
Appropriate exercise, participate in physical exercise as much as you can, develop your own hobbies, and develop weekly exercise habits.
Efforts should be made to develop regular exercise habits and improve the enthusiasm and excitement of the body.
Proper exercise to develop a habit of continuous exercise.
The diet should be light. Advocate eating seven or eighty percent full, while eating less animal fats and eating more fresh vegetables and fruits.

Do some small exercises to exercise your heart, such as the head tilting back and lifting your arms upwards. Pay attention to eating habits, eat less animal fat, eat more fresh vegetables and fruits, and eat light.
Maintain good eating habits. Pay attention to balanced diet and nutritional mix.

How long does your menstruation last?
How long is the interval between the two menstrual start dates?
What date was the last menstrual period?

The menstrual period refers to the number of days per menstrual period, usually 3 to 7 days. At this time, be careful not to be too tired to eat cold food. But the physiological period is also the best time to breast enlargement and enhance memory.
The forecast period refers to the period of menstrual prediction that the APP intelligently estimates based on your physiological cycle status.

The safety period is related to each person\'s longest period, the shortest period, and the start of the menstrual period. The safety period is not absolutely safe. Sometimes women\'s ovulation will be advanced or delayed, and the judgment of the safety period will become invalid. Judging the safety period can only reduce the chance of pregnancy and cannot be used as a method of contraception.

Normally, ovulation is usually performed about the 14th day before the next menstrual cramps. The first 5 days and the last 4 days of the ovulation day, together with the ovulation day, are called ovulation period (ie, easy pregnancy). This time is easier to get pregnant! Of course, if you are not ready to be a mother, you must take contraceptive measures.

When the menstruation is normal, the woman starts from the first day of the next menstrual period, and the 14th day is the ovulation day. Normally, ovulation is usually performed about the 14th day before the next menstrual cramps. The first 5 days and the last 4 days of the ovulation day, together with the ovulation day, are called ovulation period (ie, easy pregnancy). This time is easier to get pregnant! Of course, if you are not ready to be a mother, you must take contraceptive measures.
If the menstruation is not finished today, please choose another date to change the date.
Menstrual start time cannot be greater than today

Why do I need to keep the 3+ PRO APP running in the background?

When using the message reminder function, you need to keep the 3+ PRO APP running in the background. If the incoming call, text message, or APP notification reminder is not received, it may be caused by the manslaughter process of the following system. You can refer to the following suggestions for setting. \n\nNote: If a third-party security software is installed in the phone, you also need to add 3+ PRO to its application whitelist.
The operation steps are as follows:
1. Open the settings and click "Battery and Performance"
2. Turn off "power saving mode" and "super power saving";
3. Click "Auto Task", and then choose to close all automatic task scenarios.
1. Open the settings and click "App Settings"> "App Management";
2. Find 3+ PRO APP and click to enter;
3. Click "Power Saving Strategy" and select "Unlimited" after entering.
1. Open the settings and click "App Settings"> "App Management";
2. Find 3+ PRO APP and click to enter;
1. Open the phone manager, select "application startup management", and click to enter;
2. Find 3+ PRO and set the switch to off; at the same time, in the manual management pop-up window that pops up, check all self-start, associated start, and background activities.
If you cannot set it according to the above method, please try to set it according to the following steps:
1. Open the system settings of the phone;
3. Find 3+ PRO and set the switch to the off state; at the same time, in the manual management pop-up window that pops up, check all self-start, associated start, and background activities.
1. Open the mobile phone manager and find the permission privacy in the mobile phone manager;
2. Find the self-start management in the permission privacy, click to enter;
3. Find 3+ PRO in the program list and turn on the switch
1. Open i Manager and click "App Management";
2. Click "Permission Management" on the application management interface;
4. Find 3+ PRO in the self-start management and turn on the switch.
1. Open the "Recently Opened Programs" page of the mobile phone;
2. Press and hold the 3+ PRO APP card until the lock icon appears on the right side, click lock.
1. Open the "Recently Opened Programs" page of the mobile phone;
2, pull down the 3+ PRO APP, and a locked sign appears on the top of the APP.
1. Open the "Recently Opened Programs" page of the mobile phone;
2. Click ":" at the top of 3+ PRO APP, a lock icon appears, just click lock.
1. Open the "Most Opened Programs" page of the mobile phone;
2, pull down the 3+ PRO APP, and the lock symbol appears above the APP card.
1, open the "system settings" of the phone;
2, search for "battery optimization" in the search box;
3. Click to enter the battery optimization, and select "all applications" as the filter in the upper left corner;
4. Find 3+ PRO, select "Not allowed", and click OK.
3. Find 3+ PRO and click to enter;
4. Turn on the switch to allow background operation;
5. Click "Apply Quick Freeze" on the battery page, find 3+ PRO, and turn off automatic quick freeze.
2, select "high power consumption in the background";
1. Lock the 3+ PRO APP in the recently opened program page;
2, find the self-start management in the security center or phone settings, and then find 3+ PRO, and turn on the switch;
3. Add 3+ PRO to its whitelist in the security center or mobile phone settings;
4. If related application sleep tools, such as Green Guardian, self-starting housekeeper, etc., are installed in the phone, you need to delete 3+ PRO from the list of these sleep applications.

The temperature inside the human body is called body temperature. The normal body temperature of the human body is between 36～37.2℃ on average, exceeding 37.2℃ is fever, 37.3～38℃ is low fever, 38.1～40℃ is high fever, and above 40℃ is life-threatening.

The temperature inside the human body is called body temperature. The normal body temperature of the human body is between 96.8～98.96℉6 on average, exceeding 98.96℉ is fever, 99.14～100.4℉ is low fever, 100.58～104℉ is high fever, and above 104℉ is life-threatening.

The normal blood oxygen saturation of the human body is 95%-100%. The higher the oxygen content in the blood, the better the human metabolism. Of course, high blood oxygen content is not a good phenomenon. The blood oxygen in the human body has a certain degree of saturation. Too low will cause insufficient oxygen supply in the body, and too high will cause cell aging in the body.
Please open the application settings to enable access to contact permissions
The watch cannot synchronize weather information, which may be caused by the following reasons:
1. Permission to obtain location information without opening the APP
2. The system location service is not turned on
3. Both location information permission and location service have been turned on, please re-synchronize the data on the application device page
Notify only when the phone is locked
The system location switch is not turned on

SpO2, also known as oxygen saturation. Your blood oxygen level represents the percentage of oxygen your red blood cells carry from your lungs to the rest of your body. Knowing how well your blood performs this vital task can help you understand your overall wellness.
Measurements taken with the Blood Oxygen app are not intended for medical use and are only designed for general fitness and wellness purposes.
